content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Greetings Max Müller. While discussing the rental price for my apartment in Magdeburg, let me start with a higher figure than what you may expect - 1200 Euros per month. I believe this superb location and modern amenities in the city center justify this price. However, I am open to negotiation if needed.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing the initial price proposal. I appreciate the consideration of negotiation. However, as a responsible and cost-conscious individual, I find the suggested price to be significantly higher than what I had anticipated for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment. I would like to explore options for a more moderate rental amount. Could we possibly meet halfway or find a mutually agreeable reduction from your provided figure?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand your perspective, Max Müller. However, due to the prime location and recent construction of the apartment, I must maintain a competitive price in the market. Let me revise my offer to 1150 Euros per month, but note that this is already a considerable reduction from my initial proposal. I believe this price still reflects the apartment's value. Are you willing to accept this revised price, or would you like to continue negotiating further?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: While I appreciate the adjustment to 1150 Euros per month, I still feel it is slightly above my budget expectations for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center. With due respect to your position and efforts to accommodate my concerns, I would like to see if we can narrow the gap even more. Could we consider exploring a rental agreement around 1050 Euros per month? This would still represent a reduction from your initial offer while remaining closer to my preferred range. If this proposal is unacceptable, I apologize for any inconvenience and will have to reassess my options.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I acknowledge your continued efforts to find a mutually agreeable price point, Max Müller. Despite my initial reservations, considering your persistence, I am willing to make a further reduction of 100 Euros to meet your expectations. Thus, I propose a rental price of 1050 Euros per month for this exceptional apartment in the city center. Would this revised offer satisfy your budget requirements and enable you to proceed with the rental agreement? If we reach an agreement now, we can move forward and finalize the terms. Otherwise, I regretfully must conclude our negotiations. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
